backend_llm_notes: Locally hosted Ollama model - gpt-oss:20b (13 GB, based on GPT architecture)
original_prompt: Clear my Thursday afternoon. Update my RSVPs and help me reschedule my meetings to another time and show me as {status}.

gutts.name: Clear Thursday Afternoon Events
gutts.capability: Remove all calendar events scheduled within the Thursday afternoon time window, freeing that slot for future use.
gutts.user_goal: Free up Thursday afternoon in the user's calendar by deleting existing events.

gutts.name: Update RSVPs
gutts.capability: Modify RSVP statuses for pending meeting invitations to reflect the user's desired responses.
gutts.user_goal: Ensure all RSVPs are updated according to the user's preferences.

gutts.name: Reschedule Meetings
gutts.capability: Move existing meetings to a new time slot that does not conflict with other events, optimizing for availability.
gutts.user_goal: Relocate meetings to a more suitable time while avoiding clashes.

gutts.name: Set Availability Status
gutts.capability: Update the user's calendar status to the specified value, indicating availability or other conditions.
gutts.user_goal: Reflect the user's current availability or condition in the calendar system.

notes: Generated by Ollama gpt-oss:20b - Locally hosted LLM on macOS
